sources.title: Stories by Andre Cronje on Medium

articles.author: Andre Cronje
articles.description: I’ve spent years developing Dapps. Building is an incredibly fulfilling journey, however, it comes with frustrations. This article will…
articles.title: Frustrations of a Dapp developer

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Blur Token Live NFT marketplace Blur launched its native token BLUR and airdropped 360m of tokens to the participants of the season 1 campaign. Season 2 also began and traders can earn points for future rewards by bidding/listing NFTs on the marketplace.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Blur Token Launch, Pendulum Live, Passive Yield on Stablecoin, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Binance to Move Away from BUSD Binance CEO tweeted that Binance will move away from using BUSD as the main trading pair as the team foresees users migrating to other stablecoins over time. Issued by Paxos, BUSD is the main trading stablecoin on Binance. Paxos will
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Binance to Move Away from BUSD, rETH Live on Aave, Risk-Isolated Lending, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Aave GHO on Testnet, Liquity Live on Aztec, Paxos to Stop Issuing BUSD, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Aave GHO on Testnet Aave launched its stablecoin GHO on the Ethereum testnet Goerli. The GHO code has been audited and is available on Github. Silo Live on Arbitrum Lending protocol Silo launched on Arbitrum, initially supporting risk-isolated markets for DPX, UMAMI, and MAGIC.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Aave GHO on Testnet, Silo on Arbtirum, Meta DEX Aggregator, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Flux Finance Live Flux Finance, a lending project that connects US treasuries with DeFi, is live. Users can either deposit stablecoins to earn yield, or put US treasuries (OUSG) as collateral to borrow against. Acala EVM+ Acala launches the EVM+ mainnet, an evm compatible chain running on Polkadot’s modular blockchain framework, Substrate
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Acala EVM Live, Chiliz L1 Live, NFT Market Cap Token, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Lido V2 Coming Lido introduces V2 which will bring two major upgrades: Staking Router: A new modular architecture that allows anyone (incl. solo stakers) to become a Node Operator. Withdrawals: An upgrade allowing stETH holders to withdraw directly from the Beacon Chain.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Lido V2 Coming, Zhejiang Shapella Live, Social Trading, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Trader Joe Integrates LayerZero Trader Joe has integrated with LayerZero, and JOE is now an ‘omnichain fungible token’ (OFT), meaning users can bridge JOE across Avalanche, Arbitrum, BnB, and more chains to be supported. Stargate to Re-Issue STG Stargate
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Trader Joe Integrates LayerZero, Stargate to Re-Issue STG, LP to Earn Funding Rates, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Ethereum Zhejiang Live, Uniswap Governance Drama, Optimism Bedrock Coming, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Connext Amarok Live Bridging protocol Connext launches Amarok. This upgrade enables developers to build crossrollup apps that directly rely on the security of Ethereum. Users can now access the bridge UI, passively LP for the ecosysteum by depositing USDC & ETH, or actively by running a router.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Connext Amarok Live, Synthetix V3 Coming, Auto-Compounding Yield, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Optimism Bedrock Coming Optimism Foundation proposed Bedrock, the next upgrade to Optimism that will bring improvements to the network including transaction costs, throughput characteristics, and sync speeds. Pirex for GMX Live Redacted Cartel launches Pirex for GMX (liquid wrapper for staked GMX and staked GLP). Users are now able to deposit GMX and/or GLP and receive either pxGMX or pxGLP that earn yield as if the underlying tokens were max staked on GMX natively.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Optimism Bedrock Coming, Pirex for GMX Live, Interest Rate Derivatives, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Lyra Newport Live on Arbitrum Optimism-based options protocol Lyra launches Newport on Arbitrum. This upgrade enables cash collateral, tighter spreads, and a modular design. Check our premium guide below on how to earn rewards with Lyra. Mars Hub Deployed on Osmosis
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Lyra Newport Live, Mars Hub Deployed, Earn on Options, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: SUDO Token Live Sudoswap launches its governance token, enabling lockdrop, airdrop, and governance participation. SUDO is initially non-transferable, and the transferability will be enabled by a governance vote. Camelot x Redacted Cartel Arbitrum-based DEX Camelot announces partnership with Redacted Cartel.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - SUDO Token Live, Camelot x Redacted Cartel, GLP Strategies, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Aave V3 Live on Ethereum, Fantom fUSD Migration, Friktion Sunsetting, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Cap V4 Beta Cap launches V4 beta on Arbitrum. V4 offers low fees and zero slippage, asset prices are bound by Chainlink, and UIs are mirrored on IPFS. V4 supports 20+ markets including BTC, ETH, SPY, EUR, etc., and more are on the way. Paraswap PSP 2.0
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Cap V4 Beta, PSP 2.0, On-chain Asset Protection, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Aave v3 Coming to Ethereum, DCG Filed Bankruptcy, Polygon Hardfork Live , and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Gemzy Vaults Live NFT ownership sharing protocol Gemzy is live with a few vaults available. Gemzy vaults allow a group of participants to pool ETH and purchase NFTs through the Opensea platform, or directly OTC, and split ownership of the purchased NFT among participants based on the % of ETH they contributed to the purchase.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Gemzy Vaults Live, Harpie ON-chain 2FA, Cosmos L1 Airdrop, and More...
